Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory197.png'}
{3: 'Luna clutches onto the head of the roundabout horse. Glancing downward, you can see the mechanoids still writhing around on the ground.'}
{3: 'The girl in white turns and looks over. Her expression is one of mystery.'}
{3: 'Under the glow of the amber light, the girl is illuminated in a half-shade. The wind blows stronger as the two of you rise, higher and higher.'}
{3: 'The odd and fantastic Ferris Wheel only serves to add to the surreal air of the event.'}

{3: 'Luna is opposite to you, her two massive bundles of white hair fluttering in the wind. A few tufts of hair flicker by her eyes, and only then did you realize that, even her eyelashes are pure white.'}

{3: 'Beneath those lashes, you find her light golden pupils. Not a ripple of emotion nor disturbance can be seen, but they do emit a certain warmth. It reminds you of a dew-touched morning in late spring, calm and unbroken.'}
{2: '(Kinda makes me wanna chuckle.)', 3: '11', 4: 'Heh.', 5: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'What are you laughing at?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just how sudden all this is.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'How sudden this is?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Like what's happening now.", 3: '16'}
{2: "It's like those games that Kamui plays...", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I don't get it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This Ferris Wheel...', 3: '19'}
{3: 'Luna really does not seem to get it.'}
{2: "Ferris Wheels don't look like this.", 3: '22', 4: "You're riding a roundabout.", 5: '22'}
{2: 'Ferris Wheels and roundabouts are different.'}
{3: "A light shade of redness seems to have surfaced on Luna's face."}
{3: 'All of a sudden, the atmosphere takes an awkward turn.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I've never been on a Ferris Wheel before... I don't know about the details.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory166.png'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'A long time ago... I once hid in a theme park with my sister.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I wanted to try the rides in the theme park, so she did everything she could to power up the facilities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But before we could try them, the sounds attracted a horde of Corrupted over.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'And so I never quite knew... what a Ferris Wheel is like.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory197.png'}
{2: 'But this is pretty nice, too!', 3: '39', 4: "It's a first for me too on such a special one.", 5: '39'}
{2: 'If I never came to this place...', 3: '40'}
{2: 'I would never have gone on such a special ride.', 3: '42'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'You must be one of those types that can get a laugh out of anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'That depends on the thing.', 3: '45', 4: 'Life, lemonades. All in the mind.', 5: '45'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If you didn't stop me just now, I could have destroyed all those mechanoids. They aren't built for combat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well, we got rid of them now.', 3: '47', 4: 'This theme park is pretty nice. Let them be.', 5: '47'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Why are you doing this?', 4: '1'}
{3: "—Because when you wake up, you won't remember anything that happened deep in your M.I.N.D."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Why are you helping me?', 4: '1'}
{3: "—Because I can't get out unless you're also safe... Probably?"}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Tell me what you want.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Do you know what's the Tyndall effect?", 3: '53'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'When light passes through something with suspended particles, it becomes visible.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Which means, even when we're lost, there's a way.", 3: '997'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'What are you trying to say?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Maybe you're the Tyndall light in this dream.", 3: '996'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "What if it doesn't work?", 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll find another way.", 3: '995', 4: 'As long as we live, help will come.', 5: '995'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Where does your confidence even come from?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You're not just believing in me blindly, but others too?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just leave this to me.', 3: '63', 4: "It's kinda my job to be always confident.", 5: '63'}
{2: 'Oh, right. This is for you.', 3: '65'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "What's that?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You take out the gift, now devoid of its wrappings. It reveals itself to be a... small night light.', 4: '1'}
{2: "A'Mao gave me this by the entrance.", 3: '71'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "This is the first time I've received a gift from someone other than my sister.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I just didn't want to waste it.", 3: '73', 4: "I feel like you'll like it.", 5: '73'}
{3: 'Luna hesitates, but eventually extends her hands. You presenting her with a gift seems to have taken her by surprise.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "As Luna's fingertips are about to reach the lamp, the world falls apart again."}
{2: '...Talk about bad timing.', 4: 'When will this end...?'}
